author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While Kilmar Abrego Garcia may not have been the best poster child for illegal immigration, that is no longer trending news. Today’s show broke down the deportation of Arias-Cristobal, the left's newest immigration hoax story.

“Of course, they are going to lie to you about it,” Crowder said.

The left would like it if you believed that a college student was wrongly deported for taking a wrong turn, but that could not be further from the truth.

"You cannot be in this country illegally, disregard the laws, and expect a full ride," Crowder said.

The family had been living in this
title: Watch: The Media Just Found Their Deportation Golden Goose,  Everything You Need to Know

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Someone should really inform lawmakers that, despite how someone claims to feel deep down inside, compelled speech will always be unconstitutional. However, progressives don’t tend to really care about this thing called freedom of thought and have decided they know best, even when they mandate you speak lies.

In other words: "The further a society drifts from the truth, the more it will hate those who speak it."

To be a Colorado Democrat, you must proclaim full allegiance to the state-sanctioned religion of Colorado: g
title: Blue state passes radical new law outlawing "deadnaming" of trans people

author: Brodigan
description:
Kilmar Abrego Garcia is yesterday’s news; let us introduce you to Arias-Cristobal. She’s the new illegal immigrant turned Leftist media darling. We have a new Pope. Robert Prevost is now Pope Leo XIV. We dug into the new Pope’s X account to find out where he stands on the issues. We also hate that the new Pope has an X account into which we can dig.

WATCH & REACT

  • ESPN analyst Kate Fagan backs trans athletes during cameo with Donald T
title: HOAX WARNING: The Media is Going to Use Her To Stop Trump's Deportations (Sources)

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear what gave Bill Gates the idea that he was the unofficial and unelected spokesperson for “ the world’s poorest children,” but the media should also stop pretending he is.

During a CBS interview, Gates claimed that Musk is killing the poorest kids around the world because he is trying to make the government more efficient. It’s unclear how efficiency costs lives, but the least Gates can do is back up that statement with the least bit of evidence.

Bill Gates: "DOGE will cost 2M lives" pic.twitter.com/yJopmVZTIs
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) May 8, 2025
title: Big Gates makes unhinged accusation that Elon Musk is literally killing people with his DOGE cuts

author: Brodigan
description:
Jasmine Crockett, the recognized symbol of excellence in the modern Democrat Party, put on another of her classic performances on Thursday. During a hearing on fairness in women's sports, instead of asking the witness things that would build a case to defend the Democrat belief that boys should be allowed to play in girls' sports, she used the occasion to play a game called "Trump or Trans?" Spoiler: It was a lazy effort. We only give it a 3/10.

I know that you know how we got here. Democrats under the People Who Controlled Joe Biden administration spent four years obsessed with their political belief that boys can be girls and should therefore be allowed to play girls' sports and
title: Democrat thought leader Jasmine Crocket would rather play 'Trump or Trans' than do her job, "Ya Understan'?"
